data.marketing-features-title: Coworking Space Management Software | andCards Suite
data.marketing-features-description: The best tool for managing coworking space. Meeting room booking system, notices, billing, membership management and much more.
data.marketing-features-marketplace-title: Get more customers through andCards Spaces
data.marketing-features-marketplace-descripti: 📣 List your space on andCards.com to get new customers.
👑 Highlight your space with an eye-catching PLUS badge.
🎁 Convert customers with free trial and instant booking.
data.marketing-features-suite-title: Free member directory and notice system
data.marketing-features-suite-description-1: 👩‍💻 Manage all your coworking space customers in one place.
data.marketing-features-suite-description-2: 👣 Track plans, payments, and bookings of each customer.
data.marketing-features-suite-description-3: 💌 Keep members informed by sending them targeted notices.
data.marketing-features-booking-title: Get integrated meeting room booking system
data.marketing-features-booking-description-1: ⏳ No more booking conflicts: internal or external bookings are on the same timeline.
data.marketing-features-booking-description-2: ⭐️ Give room booking credits as a benefit to your members.
data.marketing-features-booking-description-3: 🔒 igloohome smart lock integration: people can enter the room with temporary password.
data.marketing-features-subscriptions-title: Grow your revenues with membership plan subscriptions
data.marketing-features-subscriptions-descrip: 💸 Desk or office — let customers pay easily through andCards Suite.
🔄 We'll automatically charge your customers on a monthly basis.
🌍 Invite new customers with free trials and instant bookings through andCards.com
data.marketing-features-software-title: The most powerful coworking space management software
data.marketing-features-software-description-: 📈 Space utilization and occupancy statistics to make data-driven management decisions.
data.marketing-features-request-demo-text: We'll send you a welcome package, no credit card required! 🎁
